articles.title: Footage emerges of Chesterfield keeper Lucas Covolan red carded after off-the-ball incident - FanBanter
articles.description: Footage emerges of Chesterfield keeper Lucas Covolan being red carded after an off-the-ball incident after initially rushing off his line. With the scoreline at 1-0 to the Spireites thanks to Akwasi Asante’s 18th-minute opener, debutant goalkeeper Covolan, on…
articles.content:
